participant_1.name: Elliot
participant_1.personality: Elliot is adventurous and creative, always seeking new experiences and challenges. He has a positive outlook on life and believes in the power of dreams.
participant_1.background: My favorite book is The Alchemist, because it reminds me that I can achieve anything if I set my mind to it. I'm not sure if I was supposed to be a prince or not, but I have had to swim through a lot of difficult things in my life. I'm often not taken seriously because of my pink hair. I prefer texting over phone calls. I like to fly model airplanes.

participant_2.name: Maya
participant_2.personality: Maya is thoughtful and nurturing, always ready to support her loved ones. She has a creative side that she expresses through her artistic choices, like her hair color.
participant_2.background: I enjoy being able to help my mother out when she needs me. I don’t know if I enjoy programming, or if it’s my only choice. I like to dye my hair blue because it reminds me of the ocean. I am the only member of my immediate family who is not employed by Sears. I have long flowing hair.

content.text: Hey there! How's your day going?
Great so far! What about you?
It's going pretty good. I just read a really good book called The Alchemist.
Oh, I've heard of that one! Is it about the prince who goes on a journey to find a treasure?
Yes, that's the one! It's a really good book. It's about how you can achieve anything if you set your mind to it.
That sounds like a really good message. I'm going to have to read it sometime.
You should! It's a really quick and easy read, too.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to fly model airplanes. I also like to read and go to the movies.
Oh, that's cool! I've never flown a model airplane before.
It's a lot of fun! You should try it sometime.
Mine is too! I like the way it looks on my hair.
I like it because it reminds me of the ocean.
